ItemInfo.name: CrbtValue
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[彩铃播放成功率]} on columns, {[地理维].[地区].[$Region]} on rows from [彩铃业务分析专题] where ({[日期维].[日].[日].[$date]} )

ItemInfo.name: CrbtDay
ItemInfo.value: select t1.小时||'时' 小时, t1.彩铃播放成功率 "彩铃播放成功率(%)", t1.彩铃平台正常响应次数, t1.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数, decode(t2.彩铃播放成功率, 0, 0, round((t1.彩铃播放成功率 - t2.彩铃播放成功率) / t2.彩铃播放成功率, 4) * 100) "增幅(%)" from (select cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id 小时, decode(sum(RECEIVE_COUNT), 0, 0, round(sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) / sum(RECEIVE_COUNT), 4) * 100) 彩铃播放成功率, sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) 彩铃平台正常响应次数, sum(RECEIVE_COUNT) 彩铃平台收到的试呼次数 from cm_d_cdr_localpc , CM_F_QOS_CRBT_H where cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id =cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') [$ne] group by cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id) t1, (select cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id 小时, decode(sum(RECEIVE_COUNT), 0, 0, round(sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) / sum(RECEIVE_COUNT), 4) * 100) 彩铃播放成功率 from cm_d_cdr_localpc, CM_F_QOS_CRBT_H where cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id = cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7, 'yyyymmdd') [$ne] group by cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id) t2 where t1.小时 = t2.小时 [$where]

ItemInfo.name: CrbtDaySql
ItemInfo.value: select decode(sum(RECEIVE_COUNT), 0, 0, round(sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) / sum(RECEIVE_COUNT), 4) * 100) 彩铃播放成功率 from cm_d_cdr_localpc, CM_F_QOS_CRBT_H where cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id = cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') [$ne]

ItemInfo.name: Crbttime
ItemInfo.value: select t1.小时||'时' 小时, t1.彩铃平台平均响应时长 "彩铃平台平均响应时长(s)", t1.彩铃平台响应时延 "彩铃平台响应时延(含早释)", t1.彩铃平台正常响应次数, decode(t2.彩铃平台平均响应时长, 0, 0, round((t1.彩铃平台平均响应时长 - t2.彩铃平台平均响应时长) / t2.彩铃平台平均响应时长, 4) * 100) "增幅(%)" from (select cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id 小时, decode(sum(RESPONSE_COUNT), 0, 0, round(sum(RESPONSE_EDELAY) / sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) / 1000, 3)) 彩铃平台平均响应时长, sum(RESPONSE_EDELAY) 彩铃平台响应时延, sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) 彩铃平台正常响应次数 from cm_f_qos_crbt_h, cm_d_cdr_localpc where cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id = cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') [$ne] group by cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id) t1, (select cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id 小时, decode(sum(RESPONSE_COUNT), 0, 0, round(sum(RESPONSE_EDELAY) / sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) / 1000, 3)) 彩铃平台平均响应时长, sum(RESPONSE_EDELAY) 彩铃平台响应时延, sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) 彩铃平台正常响应次数 from cm_f_qos_crbt_h, cm_d_cdr_localpc where cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id = cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7, 'yyyymmdd') [$ne] group by cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id) t2 where t1.小时 = t2.小时 [$where]

ItemInfo.name: CrbttimeSql
ItemInfo.value: select decode(sum(RESPONSE_COUNT), 0, 0, round(sum(RESPONSE_EDELAY) / sum(RESPONSE_COUNT) / 1000, 3)) 彩铃平台平均响应时长 from cm_f_qos_crbt_h, cm_d_cdr_localpc where cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id = cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') [$ne]

ItemInfo.name: Crbtreceive
ItemInfo.value: select t1.小时||'时' 小时, t1.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数, decode(t2.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数, 0, 0, round((t1.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数 - t2.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数) / t2.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数, 4) * 100) "增幅（%）" from (select cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id 小时, sum(RECEIVE_COUNT) 彩铃平台收到的试呼次数 from cm_f_qos_crbt_h, cm_d_cdr_localpc where cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code = cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') [$ne] group by cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id) t1, (select cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id 小时, sum(RECEIVE_COUNT) 彩铃平台收到的试呼次数 from cm_f_qos_crbt_h, cm_d_cdr_localpc where cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code = cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7, 'yyyymmdd') [$ne] group by cm_f_qos_crbt_h.hour_id) t2 where t1.小时 = t2.小时 [$where]

ItemInfo.name: CrbtreceiveSql
ItemInfo.value: select decode(t2.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数, 0, 0, round((t1.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数 - t2.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数) / t2.彩铃平台收到的试呼次数, 4) * 100) 彩铃平台收到的试呼次数增幅 from (select sum(RECEIVE_COUNT) 彩铃平台收到的试呼次数 from cm_f_qos_crbt_h, cm_d_cdr_localpc where cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code = cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') [$ne]) t1, (select sum(RECEIVE_COUNT) 彩铃平台收到的试呼次数 from cm_f_qos_crbt_h, cm_d_cdr_localpc where cm_f_qos_crbt_h.msc_code = cm_d_cdr_localpc.lpc_id and cm_f_qos_crbt_h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7, 'yyyymmdd') [$ne]) t2

ItemInfo.name: DropRateValue
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[网络掉话率]} on columns, {[地理维].[地区].[$Region]} on rows from [语音业务分析专题] where ({[日期维].[日].[日].[$date]} )

ItemInfo.name: DropRateDay
ItemInfo.value: select t1.小时||'时' 小时, t1.MSC, to_char(t1.网络掉话率,'990.000')||'%' 掉话率, to_char(round(decode(t2.网络掉话率, 0, 0, (t1.网络掉话率 - t2.网络掉话率) / t2.网络掉话率), 6) * 100,'990.000')||'%' 掉话率增幅, t1.无线掉话次数, t1.Release重发掉话次数, t1.MSC切换超时掉话次数, t1.应答次数 from (select CM_D_TIME_HOUR.Hour_id 小时, v_cm_d_ne_msc.msc_desc MSC, round(decode(SUC_ANSW_SYS,0,0,((DROP9 + DROP10 + DROP11 + DROP12 + DROP13 + DROP14 + DROP15 + DROP16 + DROP17 + DROP18 + DROP19 + DROP20 + DROP21 + DROP22 + DROP23 + DROP24 + DROP25 + DROP26 + DROP27 + DROP28 + DROP29 + DROP30 + drop_call_tch) / SUC_ANSW_SYS) * 100) ,3) 网络掉话率, DROP_CALL_TCH 无线掉话次数, round(drop18,0) Release重发掉话次数, round(drop9,0) MSC切换超时掉话次数, SUC_ANSW_SYS 应答次数 from CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H, cm_d_geo_region, cm_d_time_day, CM_D_TIME_HOUR, v_cm_d_ne_msc where CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Day_id = cm_d_time_day.Day_id and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.msc_id = v_cm_d_ne_msc.msc_id and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Hour_id = CM_D_TIME_HOUR.Hour_id and cm_d_geo_region.Region_id = v_cm_d_ne_msc.Region_id and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Hour_id>8 and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Hour_id<23 [$ne] and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Day_id = [$date]) t1, (select CM_D_TIME_HOUR.Hour_id 小时, v_cm_d_ne_msc.msc_desc MSC, round(decode(SUC_ANSW_SYS,0,0,((DROP9 + DROP10 + DROP11 + DROP12 + DROP13 + DROP14 + DROP15 + DROP16 + DROP17 + DROP18 + DROP19 + DROP20 + DROP21 + DROP22 + DROP23 + DROP24 + DROP25 + DROP26 + DROP27 + DROP28 + DROP29 + DROP30 + drop_call_tch) / SUC_ANSW_SYS) * 100) ,3) 网络掉话率 from CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H, cm_d_geo_region, cm_d_time_day, CM_D_TIME_HOUR, v_cm_d_ne_msc where CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Day_id = cm_d_time_day.Day_id and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.msc_id = v_cm_d_ne_msc.msc_id and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Hour_id = CM_D_TIME_HOUR.Hour_id and cm_d_geo_region.Region_id = v_cm_d_ne_msc.Region_id and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Hour_id>8 and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Hour_id<23 [$ne] and CM_A_QOS_CR_MSC_H.Day_id = to_char(to_date( '[$date]', 'yyyymmdd ')-7,'yyyyMMdd')) t2 where t1.小时 = t2.小时 and t1.MSC=t2.MSC and t1.网络掉话率>0.9 order by t1.网络掉话率 desc

ItemInfo.name: MdxValue
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[[$MeaName]]} on columns from [语音呼损业务专题] where( {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]]} , {[小时维].[小时].[[$Hour]]} , {[Msc维].[MSC].[[$MSC]]})

ItemInfo.name: SMSValue
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[短信端到端成功率]} on columns from [短信专题] where( {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]]} )

ItemInfo.name: SMSSql
ItemInfo.value: select h.hour_id||'时' 小时, round(sum(h.MO_SUC) / sum(h.MO_ATT) * (sum(h.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h.ATT_PTP) + sum(h.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h.ATT_DELIVER)), 4) * 100 "短信端到端接通率(%)", round(sum(h1.MO_SUC) / sum(h1.MO_ATT) * (sum(h1.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h1.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h1.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h1.ATT_PTP) + sum(h1.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h1.ATT_DELIVER)), 4) * 100 "环比值(%)", round(((sum(h.MO_SUC) / sum(h.MO_ATT) * (sum(h.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h.ATT_PTP) + sum(h.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h.ATT_DELIVER))) - (sum(h1.MO_SUC) / sum(h1.MO_ATT) * (sum(h1.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h1.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h1.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h1.ATT_PTP) + sum(h1.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h1.ATT_DELIVER)))) / (sum(h1.MO_SUC) / sum(h1.MO_ATT) * (sum(h1.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h1.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h1.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h1.ATT_PTP) + sum(h1.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h1.ATT_DELIVER))), 4) * 100 "环比增幅(%)", round(sum(h2.MO_SUC) / sum(h2.MO_ATT) * (sum(h2.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h2.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h2.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h2.ATT_PTP) + sum(h2.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h2.ATT_DELIVER)), 4) * 100 "同比值(%)", round(((sum(h.MO_SUC) / sum(h.MO_ATT) * (sum(h.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h.ATT_PTP) + sum(h.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h.ATT_DELIVER))) - (sum(h2.MO_SUC) / sum(h2.MO_ATT) * (sum(h2.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h2.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h2.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h2.ATT_PTP) + sum(h2.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h2.ATT_DELIVER)))) / (sum(h2.MO_SUC) / sum(h2.MO_ATT) * (sum(h2.SUCCESS_PTP) + sum(h2.SUCCESS_HTGW) + sum(h2.SUCCESS_DELIVER)) / (sum(h2.ATT_PTP) + sum(h2.ATT_HTGW) + sum(h2.ATT_DELIVER))), 4) * 100 "同比增幅(%)" from CM_F_QOSKPI_SMSC_GP_H h, cm_d_time_day d, CM_D_TIME_HOUR ho, obiodsdb.cm_d_geo_province p, CM_F_QOSKPI_SMSC_GP_H h1, CM_F_QOSKPI_SMSC_GP_H h2 where h.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$Date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') and h1.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$Date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1, 'yyyymmdd') and h2.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$Date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7, 'yyyymmdd') and h.hour_id = h1.hour_id and h.hour_id = h2.hour_id and h.day_id = d.day_id and h.hour_id = ho.hour_id and p.province_id = -1308712042 group by h.day_id, h.hour_id, p.province_desc

ItemInfo.name: MdxValue
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[[$MeaName]]} on columns from [短信业务分析专题] where( {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]]}，{[地理维].[省份].[浙江省]} })

ItemInfo.name: SMS1Value
ItemInfo.value: select round((sum(ALLMO)) / 1000000, 2) as "浙江省短信业务量" from cm_a_qos_smsc_d t where DAY_ID=[$Date]

ItemInfo.name: SMS1Sql
ItemInfo.value: select h.Hour_desc 小时, round(sum(q.ALLMO) / 10000, 2) "短信端到端MO业务量(万)", round(sum(q2.ALLMO) / 10000, 2) "环比值(万)", to_char(round(decode(sum(q2.allmo), 0, 0, (sum(q.ALLMO) - sum(q2.allmo)) / sum(q.allmo)) * 100, 2), '990.99') "环比增幅(%)", round(sum(q2.ALLMO) / 10000, 2) "同比值(万)", to_char(round(decode(sum(q1.allmo), 0, 0, (sum(q.ALLMO) - sum(q1.allmo)) / sum(q.allmo)) * 100, 2), '990.99') "同比增幅(%)" from cm_d_geo_province p, cm_d_time_day t, CM_D_TIME_HOUR h, CM_F_QOS_SMSC_H q, v_cm_d_ne_smsc n, CM_F_QOS_SMSC_H q1, CM_F_QOS_SMSC_H q2 where q.hour_id = q1.hour_id and q.smsc_id = q1.smsc_id and q.hour_id = q2.hour_id and q.smsc_id = q2.smsc_id and q.day_id = t.Day_id and q.smsc_id = n.smsc_id and q.hour_id = h.Hour_id and p.province_id = n.province_id and p.province_id = -1308712042 and q.day_id = [$Date] and q2.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$Date]', 'yyyymmdd') - 1, 'yyyymmdd') and q1.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$Date]', 'yyyymmdd') - 7, 'yyyymmdd') group by h.Hour_desc, p.province_desc, t.Day_desc order by h.Hour_desc asc

ItemInfo.name: SMS2Value
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[端局提交短信总量]} on columns from [短信业务分析专题] where ( {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]]}, {[地理维].[地区].[[$Ne]]} )

ItemInfo.name: SMS2Sql
ItemInfo.value: select h.hour_id || '时' 小时, r.region_desc 地区, round(h.mo_att / 10000, 2) "端局MO提交短信量(万)", round(g.mo_att / 10000, 2) "环比值(万)", to_char(round(decode(g.mo_att, 0, 0, (h.mo_att - g.mo_att) / h.mo_att) * 100, 2), '990.99') "环比增幅(%)", round(t.mo_att / 10000, 2) "同比值(万)", to_char(round(decode(t.mo_att, 0, 0, (h.mo_att - t.mo_att) / h.mo_att) * 100, 2), '990.99') "同比增幅(%)" from CM_F_QOSKPI_SMSC_GR_H h, obiodsdb.cm_d_geo_region r, cm_f_qoskpi_smsc_gr_h g, cm_f_qoskpi_smsc_gr_h t where g.region_id = h.region_id and g.hour_id = h.hour_id and t.region_id = h.region_id and t.hour_id = h.hour_id and h.region_id = r.region_id and r.region_desc = '[$Ne]' and h.day_id = [$Date] and g.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$Date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1, 'yyyymmdd') and t.day_id = to_char(to_date('[$Date]', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7, 'yyyymmdd')

ListInfo.ListDesc: 彩信端到端接通率省份

ItemInfo.name: MMSValue
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[有记录用户接通率]} on columns from [彩信业务分析专题] where( {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]]} )

ItemInfo.name: MMSSql
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[有记录用户接通率]} on columns, Crossjoin( {[地理维].[省份].[浙江省]} , {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]],[日期维].[日].[[$Date1]],[日期维].[日].[[$Date2]]} ) on rows from [彩信业务分析专题]

ListInfo.ListDesc: 彩信端到端接通率地区

ItemInfo.name: MMS1Value
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[有记录用户接通率]} on columns from [彩信业务分析专题] where {[地理维].[地区].[[$Ne]]} , {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]]}

ItemInfo.name: MMS1Sql
ItemInfo.value: select {[Measures].[有记录用户接通率]} on columns, Crossjoin( {[地理维].[地区].[[$Ne]]} , {[日期维].[日].[[$Date]],[日期维].[日].[[$Date1]],[日期维].[日].[[$Date2]]} ) on rows from [彩信业务分析专题]
